name: validate_cnpj
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cnpj_validator.
Tool description: Validates Brazilian CNPJ numbers. It can also generate random, valid numbers.
API description: Validate a CNPJ number using the Toolbench RapidAPI service, ignoring certain characters such as ., -, and /.

n.description: The CNPJ number to be validated.
